thread.title: Kevin Gates Kept In Jail On Scheduled Release Day
thread.title_full: Kevin Gates Kept In Jail On Scheduled Release Day

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Kevin Gates Kept In Jail On Scheduled Release Day
text:
Home > Music > Kevin Gates Kept In Jail On Scheduled Release Day Kevin Gates Kept In Jail On Scheduled Release Day 0 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Mar 24, 2017 at 11:16am Kevin Gates was scheduled to get out of jail today, but he'll have to stay longer due to an outstanding warrant in Illinois. 
Kevin Gates was scheduled to be released from Polk County Jail today after serving 180 days for kicking a female fan in the chest in August 2015. But he won't be getting out just yet. 
XXL reports that Gates will be extradited from Polk County to Cook County in Illinois, where he has a warrant for a felony weapons charge. According to the Tampa Bay Times , Gates was the recipient of “several gun charges from 2013 in Illinois, including aggravated unlawful use of a weapon.” 
Stay tuned for more information: a hearing is reportedly scheduled for later today.
